Plot: The tragedy and curse of a family. A climactic duel with a dark and dangerous wizard. This is the moment that changed the fate of Albus, Aberforth, and Ariana Dumbledore forever.
Title: The Greater Good
Writer: J.K. Rowling (based on a story by), Justin Zagri
Actors: Josh Brodis, Christopher James Cramer, Colin Goodridge, Kari Swanson
